name: Sifterra: Call of The Stones
description:
Face off against the Imprisoned Shadow, Bartholam, in this exciting Prologue Demo for Sifterra: Call of The Stones! 

Long ago a young elf dreamt of sitting alongside the gods. Over 300 years later, that wish came true in the worst way possible.

Test Your Meddle against the one who killed a god and took his throne, throwing the universe into chaos.

*Sifterra is a Studio Demo / Prototype from Eternal Softworks that was created in a small timeframe by people learning the world of Game Development and Pixel Art! This was our first ever venture into Game Development, so we wanted to share it with all of you. Thank you for playing; we hope you enjoy!!*

**To start the game, hit "space" upon loading in!**
